attributes.action: A permanent memorial for Fusilier Lee Rigby
attributes.additional_details: We the public demand that a permanent memorial for Lee Rigby is erected as close as is practical to the place of his murder so that Lee's family and the public can remember and pay they're respects to a fallen soldier who served bravely with the British Army.We believe that Lee has done his duty in serving this country and it is only right that a fitting memorial be erected in memory of a soldier who's life was taken by enemys of this country.
